events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and will review your qualifications shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering for a software developer role requiring backend expertise.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
Your initial screening went well, showing strong fundamentals and enthusiasm for the software engineering position.
Thank you for your prompt reply confirming your availability for the technical interview next week.
We have scheduled your technical interview with our senior developer for March 20th at 10 AM UTC.
Your technical interview was completed successfully, demonstrating excellent problem-solving skills and coding proficiency.
We scheduled an HR interview on March 25th to discuss your career goals and fit within our company culture.
Your HR interview went very well, and we appreciate your alignment with our company's values and vision.
We have extended a formal offer for the software engineer role including salary and benefits details.
The candidate provided positive feedback and expressed enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
The candidate has accepted the job offer and is excited to start contributing as a software engineer.
Onboarding has commenced and the new hire has received all necessary resources to begin work smoothly.
The recruitment process is officially closed with the successful integration of the new software engineer.
